startPage.subtitle: Guidance
startPage.title: Register your accommodation to pay visitor levy
startPage.introPara: As an accommodation provider, use this service to register your accommodation for visitor levy
startPage.timePara: Allow 15 minutes to register your accommodation. If you have more than 1 accommodation, allow an extra 5 minutes for each one.
startPage.whoRegister: If you’re a visitor to Wales, you do not need to register with this service. Your accommodation provider will collect the levy from you.
startPage.beforeStartSameAccom: You cannot register the same accommodation more than once. If you’re unsure, you can see the accommodation that has been registered to your account when you login.
listItems: If you are a company, you will need your companies house reference number
startPage.supportText: if you need any help with this process.
